ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That Day the only resting place will be your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: With your Lord alone will be the retreat on that day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: With your Lord alone will be the retreat that Day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The only place of refuge will be with God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: On that day, the station is only towards your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Unto your Lord will be the place of rest that Day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: With your Lord alone shall on that day be the place of rest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Upon that day the recourse shall be to thy Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Unto thy Lord is the recourse that day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: on that Day, to your Lord alone is the recourse.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Unto thy Lord that Day is the recourse.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: That day the [final] goal will be toward your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Before thy Lord (alone), that Day will be the place of rest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Unto your Lord (Alone) will be the place of rest that Day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: For on that Day the refuge shall be to your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: To your Lord on that Day is the settlement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: To your Lord, that Day, is the [place of] permanence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [75:12] On that day the recourse will be to your Lord, the [final] recourse of all creatures, whereupon they will be reckoned with and requited.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 711 (Unto thy Lord is the recourse) the return and last resort (that day) the Day of Judgement.
